mapper.select: select ur.resource_id from user_roles ur where ur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ur.role = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ur.resource_id is not null union select gr.resource_id from group_roles gr inner join groups_users gu on gr.group_id=gu.group_id where gr.role = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and gr.resource_id is not null and gu.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by resource_id
